items.title: Windows 11 is adding another Copilot button nobody asked for
items.raw_excerpt: Have enough Copilot buttons in your life? No you don’t — have another one! This one pops up in the latest Windows 11 Insider Preview when mousing over an open app in your taskbar; it lets you share the contents with Copilot Vision. Want to know who is celebrating in that dogpile on the mound, […]

title_i18n.en: Windows 11 is adding another Copilot button nobody asked for
title_i18n.zh: Windows 11又添加了一个没人要求的Copilot按钮
title_i18n.es: Windows 11 está añadiendo otro botón de Copilot que nadie pidió.

excerpt_i18n.en: Have enough Copilot buttons in your life? No you don’t — have another one! This one pops up in the latest Windows 11 Insider Preview when mousing over an open app in your taskbar; it lets you share the contents with Copilot Vision. Want to know who is celebrating in that dogpile on the mound, […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 你的生活中有足够的Copilot按钮吗？显然还不够——再来一个吧！这个新按钮出现在最新的Windows 11 Insider Preview中，当你将鼠标悬停在任务栏上已打开的应用程序时，它会让你与Copilot分享内容。
excerpt_i18n.es: ¿Tienes suficientes botones de Copilot en tu vida? No, no es así — ¡aquí tienes otro! Este aparece en la última versión preliminar de Windows 11 Insider al pasar el ratón por encima de una aplicación abierta en tu barra de tareas; te permite compartir el contenido con Copilot.

items.title: Show HN: PayDroid – AI agents can now accept payments
items.raw_excerpt: Agents can talk, code, and browse… but until now, they couldn’t accept money. We built PayDroid, a universal checkout for AI agents. It routes through the merchant’s own processor (starting with PayPal, Stripe coming soon), so there’s no license, no custody, and no messy integration work. Developers just integrate once, and agents get a frictionless callback flow that works everywhere. Demo (live with PayPal): https://demo.paydroid.ai Docs: https://paydroid.ai Would love feedback — what would you sell through your agent?

title_i18n.en: Show HN: PayDroid – AI agents can now accept payments
title_i18n.zh: 展示 HN：PayDroid——AI 代理现可接收付款
title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: PayDroid – Los agentes de IA ya pueden aceptar pagos

excerpt_i18n.en: Agents can talk, code, and browse… but until now, they couldn’t accept money. We built PayDroid, a universal checkout for AI agents. It routes through the merchant’s own processor (starting with PayPal, Stripe coming soon), so there’s no license, no custody, and no messy integration work. Developers just integrate once, and agents get a frictionless callback flow that works everywhere. Demo (live with PayPal): https://demo.paydroid.ai Docs: https://paydroid.ai Would love feedback — what would you sell through your agent?
excerpt_i18n.zh: 智能体可以交谈、编程和浏览……但直到现在，它们还无法收款。我们开发了PayDroid——专为AI智能体打造的通用支付系统。它通过商家自有支付处理器进行路由（首批支持PayPal，Stripe即将接入）。
excerpt_i18n.es: Los agentes pueden hablar, programar y navegar… pero hasta ahora no podían aceptar dinero. Creamos PayDroid, una pasarela de pago universal para agentes de IA. Se canaliza a través del procesador propio del comerciante (empezando por PayPal, Stripe llegará pronto).

items.title: Show HN: PlantDiagrams – AI-powered PlantUML editor
items.raw_excerpt:
Hi HN! I couldn’t find a truly user-friendly PlantUML editor, so I set out to build one. PlantDiagrams lets you describe a diagram in plain English; it generates the PlantUML and renders it instantly. The goal is to shorten the path from idea → diagram without fighting the editor. Tech: - Next.js / Supabase / FLy.io / Vercel Highlights
- Natural-language to PlantUML with live preview
- Export diagrams (SVG/PNG/TXT)
- Organize work with Projects
- Share via link; optional comments for review
- Sample gallery to open and tweak examples Try it: https://www.plantdiagrams.com

title_i18n.en: Show HN: PlantDiagrams – AI-powered PlantUML editor
title_i18n.zh: HN展示：PlantDiagrams——AI驱动的PlantUML编辑器
title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: PlantDiagrams – Editor de PlantUML con tecnología de IA

excerpt_i18n.en:
Hi HN! I couldn’t find a truly user-friendly PlantUML editor, so I set out to build one. PlantDiagrams lets you describe a diagram in plain English; it generates the PlantUML and renders it instantly. The goal is to shorten the path from idea → diagram without fighting the editor. Tech: - Next.js / Supabase / FLy.io / Vercel Highlights
- Natural-language to PlantUML with live preview
- Export diagrams (SVG/PNG/TXT)
- Organize work with Projects
- Share via link; optional comments for review
- Sample gallery to open and tweak examples Try it: https://www.plantdiagrams.com
excerpt_i18n.zh: 大家好！我找不到真正好用的PlantUML编辑器，就自己动手做了一个。PlantDiagrams让你用简单英语描述图表，它生成PlantUML代码并即时渲染，目标是缩短
excerpt_i18n.es: ¡Hola HN! No pude encontrar un editor de PlantUML verdaderamente fácil de usar, así que me puse a construir uno. PlantDiagrams te permite describir un diagrama en inglés sencillo; genera el código PlantUML y lo renderiza al instante. El objetivo es acortar

items.title: Show HN: I built a free AI prompts and rules directory
items.raw_excerpt: Got tired of saving my prompts scattered across X, Reddit, and Notion with no good way to organize or share them. That's why I built CTX, a community collection of prompts and rules. Create, share, and remix – everything's free and community-curated. Let me know what you think, any feedback is very welcome!

title_i18n.en: Show HN: I built a free AI prompts and rules directory
title_i18n.zh: 展示HN：我创建了一个免费的AI提示与规则目录
title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: Creé un directorio gratuito de instrucciones y reglas de IA

excerpt_i18n.en: Got tired of saving my prompts scattered across X, Reddit, and Notion with no good way to organize or share them. That's why I built CTX, a community collection of prompts and rules. Create, share, and remix – everything's free and community-curated. Let me know what you think, any feedback is very welcome!
excerpt_i18n.zh: 厌倦了在X、Reddit和Notion上零散保存提示词却无法有效整理或分享，因此我创建了CTX——一个提示词与规则的社区合集。创作、分享、再混合，一切尽在其中。
excerpt_i18n.es: Me cansé de guardar mis prompts dispersos por X, Reddit y Notion sin una buena forma de organizarlos o compartirlos. Por eso creé CTX, una colección comunitaria de prompts y reglas. Crea, comparte y remezcla: todo.

items.title: Fireworks AI – Charging $192 for less than $0.20 of Training Cost
items.raw_excerpt: Fireworks AI is one of the most overpriced model hosting companies in the ecosystem. I tried their fine-tuning service with a very small dataset of 10k records using SFT with gpt-oss-20b. It ran for 8 mins, and I got a bill for $192 !!! You can get A100s for $1.29/hr on Lambda, for 8 minutes of time that’s $0.17 This is maybe the biggest markup I’ve ever seen in the industry. Anyone can just spin up a runpod or modal instance and do it for a small fraction of the cost. Anyway, buyer beware, this is money I won’t get back. Not to mention the service is overall just mediocre.

title_i18n.en: Fireworks AI – Charging $192 for less than $0.20 of Training Cost
title_i18n.zh: Fireworks AI——训练成本不足0.20美元却收费192美元
title_i18n.es: Fireworks AI: cobrando 192 dólares por menos de 0,20 dólares de coste de entrenamiento.

excerpt_i18n.en: Fireworks AI is one of the most overpriced model hosting companies in the ecosystem. I tried their fine-tuning service with a very small dataset of 10k records using SFT with gpt-oss-20b. It ran for 8 mins, and I got a bill for $192 !!! You can get A100s for $1.29/hr on Lambda, for 8 minutes of time that’s $0.17 This is maybe the biggest markup I’ve ever seen in the industry. Anyone can just spin up a runpod or modal instance and do it for a small fraction of the cost. Anyway, buyer beware, this is money I won’t get back. Not to mention the service is overall just mediocre.
excerpt_i18n.zh: Fireworks AI是生态圈中定价最虚高的模型托管公司之一。我尝试用他们1万条记录的小型数据集，通过GPT-OSS-20B模型进行监督微调服务。运行8分钟后，我收到了一个b
excerpt_i18n.es: Fireworks AI es una de las empresas de alojamiento de modelos más sobrevaloradas del ecosistema. Probé su servicio de fine-tuning con un conjunto de datos muy pequeño de 10.000 registros usando SFT con gpt-oss-20b. Se ejecutó durante 8 minutos y obtuve una b

items.title: Ask HN: Would you allow an AI to go on most of your dates for you?
items.raw_excerpt: Dating is expensive, time-consuming, and often… exhausting. What if there were a way to test compatibility before even leaving your couch? Here’s the idea: * Your personal AI chatbot learns your personality from your social media writing. * Instead of going on every date in real life, your chatbot "goes on dates" with other users' chatbots. * Chats that go well in these AI simulations are then escalated to actual humans, so you only meet people with real potential. * Basically, AI-simulated conversations filter out the bad dates so you can focus on the good ones — saving time, money, and awkward conversations. Would you try a service like this?

title_i18n.en: Ask HN: Would you allow an AI to go on most of your dates for you?
title_i18n.zh: 问HN：你会允许AI替你参加大部分约会吗？
title_i18n.es: Pregunta para HN: ¿Permitirías que una IA acudiera a la mayoría de tus citas por ti?

excerpt_i18n.en: Dating is expensive, time-consuming, and often… exhausting. What if there were a way to test compatibility before even leaving your couch? Here’s the idea: * Your personal AI chatbot learns your personality from your social media writing. * Instead of going on every date in real life, your chatbot "goes on dates" with other users' chatbots. * Chats that go well in these AI simulations are then escalated to actual humans, so you only meet people with real potential. * Basically, AI-simulated conversations filter out the bad dates so you can focus on the good ones — saving time, money, and awkward conversations. Would you try a service like this?
excerpt_i18n.zh: 约会既昂贵又耗时，还常常令人疲惫。如果足不出户就能测试双方契合度呢？设想如下：* 您的个人AI聊天机器人通过社媒数据学习您的个性特征——
excerpt_i18n.es: Las citas son caras, consumen mucho tiempo y a menudo... agotadoras. ¿Y si existiera una forma de probar la compatibilidad incluso antes de levantarse del sofá? Esta es la idea: * Tu chatbot de IA personal aprende tu personalidad a partir de tus redes

items.title: Move your AI agents from proof of concept to production with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
items.raw_excerpt: This post explores how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore helps you transition your agentic applications from experimental proof of concept to production-ready systems. We follow the journey of a customer support agent that evolves from a simple local prototype to a comprehensive, enterprise-grade solution capable of handling multiple concurrent users while maintaining security and performance standards.

title_i18n.en: Move your AI agents from proof of concept to production with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
title_i18n.zh: 借助Amazon Bedrock AgentCore，将您的AI代理从概念验证推进至生产环境。
title_i18n.es: Lleva tus agentes de IA del concepto a la producción con Amazon Bedrock AgentCore.

excerpt_i18n.en: This post explores how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore helps you transition your agentic applications from experimental proof of concept to production-ready systems. We follow the journey of a customer support agent that evolves from a simple local prototype to a comprehensive, enterprise-grade solution capable of handling multiple concurrent users while maintaining security and performance standards.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 本文探讨了Amazon Bedrock AgentCore如何帮助您将智能体应用程序从实验性概念验证转变为生产就绪系统。我们将跟随一个客户支持智能体的演进历程展开说明。
excerpt_i18n.es: Esta publicación explora cómo Amazon Bedrock AgentCore te ayuda a transicionar tus aplicaciones agentivas desde pruebas de concepto experimentales hasta sistemas listos para producción. Seguimos el recorrido de un agente de soporte al cliente que evoluciona
